item.title: Untaxed motorbike, 13th October
item.description:
This motorbike LB69 NUH is untaxed (SORN) and has been outside 21 Burwash Road for weeks without moving. Please sort this out. There are other motorbikes parked on the pavement which is a hazard for pedestrians. The pavement is also blocked by their wheelie bins.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burwash Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary Traffic Light Oakfield Gardens is dangerous, 13th October
item.description:
Contractors creating a crossing point on South Eden Park Road junction with Oakfield Gardens have put up three way temporary traffic lights. Also in Oakfield Gardens they have installed a metal container like works storage unit. If you come down Oakfield Gardens you cannot see the traffic light as the works unit obscures the light. This caused vehicle to stop at the red light in the oncoming lane facing South Eden Park Road. If another vehicle comes around the corner into Oakfield Gardens they may encounter a stationary vehicle in the wrong lane but have very little time to react as the corner is blind. I think Chapter 8 of the DOT Traffic Signs manual would not permit this type of arrangement as it is clearly dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakfield Gardens, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant flytipping seen as acceptable as recycling and rubbish bags left here for collection, 13th October
item.description:
Mainly from a nearby building with high turnover of flats. Constant dumping of household furniture from sofas to white goods, mattresses and bed bases as well as cupboards. Council need to put up a sign about flytipping as offence contact landlords too.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet
